snippet: Senator Kirsten Gillibrand is right in trying to persuade her colleagues not to cut food benefits to families who are living in poverty.
abstract: Editorial supports Sen Kirsten Gillibrand's effort to persuade her Democratic colleagues to block proposed $4.1 billion cut in food stamps, part of omnibus farm bill heading toward Senate committee vote; argues that struggling families and children already living in poverty cannot bear more cuts in food stamps.
lead_paragraph: Senator Kirsten Gillibrand is right in trying to persuade her colleagues not to cut food benefits to families who are living in poverty.

headline.seo: This Is No Time to Cut Food Stamps
headline.main: No Time to Cut Food Stamps
headline.print_headline: No Time to Cut Food Stamps
